S02bsu024_u:251_9: ye ca tatra imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ yadaśubhena karmaṇā dīrghaglāniḥ dhātusaṃkṣobho vā svarasaṃkṣobho vā syāt tat sarvaṃ parikṣayaṃ yāsyati /

S02bsu024_u:255_0: tatra ca śikhindharī nāma śakro jāmbūnadamayena niṣkāvabhāsenālaṃkṛtakāyo nātidūre niṣaṇṇaḥ /

S02bsu024_u:260_5: vada tvaṃ satpuruṣa / vayaṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ [Dutt_124] bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ ca purato 'syāṃ dhāraṇyāṃ chandaṃ dadāmaḥ /

S02bsu024_u:277_2: kāruṇyena sattvaparipākārthaṃ yāvadanuttare mārge pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ vayamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ grāmanagaranigamajanapadarājadhānyaraṇyāyataneṣu vistareṇa uddayotayiṣyāmaḥ /
